::DrillBit::

DrillBit dodges the new berage of fire from Autofire.
"You're good, but outnumbered!" He yells, shooting more shots at
Autofire.

::Hot Rod::

Hiss's shots hit Hot Rod, sending him into stasis lock.
-Computer- "Damage severe, unit in stasis, untill repairs are complete."
